CustomField.formula: Case( Timeline_for_Decision__c , "0 - 30 Days", 1,"3 Months", 4,"6 Months",4, "1 Year", 1,"Over 1 Year",1,0)+ IF( Has_Approved_Budget__c, 5, 0) + IF(LEN( Business_Issues_Driving_the_Purchase__c ) >0 , 6, 0) + IF(Relations_Established_with_Digicel__c,4,0) + IF( Net_MTH_MRC_Total__c > 5000.00, 6 , 0)
CustomField.label: ZDEPRECATED Opportunity Cloud
